urls.title: footer
urls.description: Q Bag Tags can only be used for domestic travel. The scanners in the Bag Drop detect your Q Bag Tag. The Bag Drop then encodes the details from your flight booking onto the intelligent Q chip embedded in the Q Bag Tag, allowing it to be delivered to the correct destination. You can also choose to lend yours to a family member or friend when they are travelling. Passengers details will be linked to the Q Bag Tag at check-in when the boarding card is issued. Q Bag Tags are available to purchase at the Qantas Rewards Store.  Browse the Rewards Store for luggage and other Qantas travel accessories.
urls.unwound_url: https://help.qantas.com/support/s/article/About-Q-Bag-Tags#:~:text=13/09/2022%E2%80%A2Knowledge&text=The Bag Drop then encodes,friend when they are travelling.
